Package pt.ist.fenixframework.dml

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeletionBlockerListener<T extends DomainObject>
    A DeletionBlockerListener gives its implementations a chance to aid domain objects in determining whether they can be safely deleted.
    DeletionListener<T extends DomainObject>
    A DeletionListenerÂ is invoked when an object is being deleted, before the Framework performing any automated consistency-checks, giving the application a chance to handle the deletion of the provided object.
    DmlTokenTypes  
    DmlTreeParserTokenTypes

    This code generator adds the possibility of collecting information about the data access patterns performed by any target application built with the fenix-framework.
